Package com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActiveState<T>
    Contains a value which can be used to temporarily change states
    For example, setting it to a value, and after you are done, setting it back to the old value
    AsyncTask
    A wrapper class around a Thread that can:
    - Create an infinite loop that can be stopped externally
    - Provide an error-free sleep function
    BlockDataTest  
    BlockLocation
    Contains a world name and block coordinates
    CBEntitySliceTest  
    ChatTextTest  
    CircularInteger
    A circular integer is an ever cycling integer value from 0 to size - 1
    When the last value (size) is reached, it resets to 0
    Iterating a Circular Integer will result in an infinite loop, as the sequence never ends
    Common  
    ConfigTest
    Tests BasicConfiguration YAML stuff
    DataWatcherTest  
    DebugLogger
    Enables logging debug data to console in an efficient and readable fashion.
    DebugLogInstancesTest  
    DebugLogInstancesTest.TestClass1  
    DebugLogInstancesTest.TestClass2  
    DebugLogInstancesTest.TestClass3  
    EntityRegistryTest  
    FromToCounter
    A simple Integer iterator that counts from one value to the other.
    ImplicitSharingTest
    Tests container classes that use implicit sharing to avoid creating unneeded copies
    IntHashMapTest  
    IntRemainder
    The Int Remainder uses a set amount of different Integer values to represent a single Double value
    Integer values can be asked from this Int Remainder, the average of all the returned values is the contained Double value
    This allows to, for example, work with Double rates when only Integer rates were possible
    InventoryTest
    Tests whether the base implementation for Bukkit inventories works correctly
    ItemMaterialTest  
    Logging  
    LogicUtilTest  
    MapCanvasFunctionsTest
    Tests the correct functioning of map canvas functions by visual inspection
    MapColorPaletteTest  
    MapIsometricTest
    Tests isometric rendering of blocks
    MapModelRenderTest  
    MapResourcePackTest
    These test the various texture/model loading routines of the Map Resource Pack
    MaterialBooleanProperty
    Base class for material properties that return a Boolean when getting.
    MaterialProperty<T>
    Represents a property for a given material
    If a material container is null, air (0) is used

    It is required to either implement MaterialProperty.get(int) or MaterialProperty.get(Material).
    MaterialTypeProperty
    Can compare a material with an internal whitelist of materials
    MathUtilTest  
    MessageBuilder  
    ModuleLogger
    A logger that is meant to log a given module of the server, for example that of a Plugin
    NBTTest  
    PacketTest  
    PermissionsConversionTest  
    PluginBase
    The extended javaPlugin base used to communicate with BKCommonLib

    Handles dependencies, command registration, event listener registration, permissions and permission defaults, logging, error handling and localization.
    PostTestHandler  
    ProtocolTest  
    RecipeTest  
    ReflectionTest  
    StackTraceFilter
    Allows the filtering of source stack trace elements.
    StopWatch
    A nanosecond stop watch used to measure code execution times
    StringReplaceBundle
    Can perform a large amount of String replacements at once.
    Task  
    TemplateTest  
    TickTracker
    Tracks the current server tick to check for when the current tick has changed.
    Timings
    Thin wrapper around MC Timings by aikar for easily storing and performing timings measurements.
    ToggledState
    Allows you to toggle this Boolean On or Off
    TypedValue<T>
    Stores a Class Type and a value for type-safe generics
    WorldProperty<T>
